forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.
